README: input_path : input list or audio file, if path have audio ext, path is judged as audio file
output_path : output list or audio file, same with input_path
work_list : list of augmentation work, executed in order
rand_opt : when opt have multiple elements, 1 : use n-th element randomly, 0 : use 1st element
snr : add noise to audio, adjust noise amplitude to audio
align : work output or noise position, head : initial, tail : last, mid : central, rand : random position, offset : use offset value
offset : (sec) move initial sample of noise, audio, offset > 0 : move right, offset < 0 : move left
circular : when audio is shifted, 1 : keep samples over range, 0 : discard samples
extend : when audio is shifted to right with circular 0, 1 : extend audio length (0 padding),  0 : discard samples
length : (sec) adjust length of audio at last of work
